Package org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb

Class Xact

java.lang.Object
org.reldb.wrapd.sqldb.Xact
public class Xact extends Object
Transaction wrapper that allows database query and update operations to be invoked transactionally in an ergonomic fashion.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Connection
    connection
    Connection to database this transaction is running in.
    protected Database
    database
    Database upon which this transaction will run.

    • valueOfAll

      public Object valueOfAll​(String query, String columnName) throws SQLException
      Issue a SELECT query and obtain a value for the first row in a specified column name. Intended to obtain a single value.
      Parameters:
      query - SELECT query.
      columnName - Column name from which to retrieve first row's value.
      Returns:
      Value of first row in columnName.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error.

    • valueOf

      public Object valueOf​(String query, String columnName, Object... parms) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      query - SELECT query.
      columnName - Column name from which to retrieve first row's value.
      parms - Parameter arguments.
      Returns:
      Value of first row in columnName.

      SQLException - Error.

    • insert

      public List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure> insert​(Tuple tuple, String tableName) throws SQLException
      Insert specified Tuple.
      Parameters:
      tuple - Tuple to insert.
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      List of failures to retrieve one or more fields. Empty if all fields retrieved.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Failure.

    • update

      public boolean update​(String query, Object... parms) throws SQLException
      Issue a parametric update query with '?' substitutions.
      Parameters:
      query - SQL query.
      parms - Parameter arguments.
      Returns:
      True if a ResultSet is returned, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error.

    • update

      public Pair<List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>,​List<Tuple.FieldGetFailure>> update​(Tuple tuple, String tableName) throws SQLException
      Update specified tuple.
      Parameters:
      tuple - Tuple to update.
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      Return a pair of List<FieldGetFailure> where the left item is the new field get failures, and the right item is the original (backup) field get failures. Both lists in the Pair are empty if successful.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Failure.

    • createTupleFromQuery

      public Result createTupleFromQuery​(String codeDirectory, String packageSpec, String tupleClassName, String query, Object... parms) throws SQLException
      Use a parametric SELECT query to generate a corresponding Tuple-derived class to represent future evaluations of the same query or similar queries.
      Parameters:
      codeDirectory - Directory in which compiled Tuple-derived source and .class will be generated.
      packageSpec - The package, in dotted notation, to which the Tuple belongs.
      tupleClassName - Name of desired Tuple-derived class.
      query - Query to be evaluated.
      parms - Parameter arguments which positionally match to '?' in the query.
      Returns:
      Result of code generation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error.

    • createTupleFromQueryAll

      public Result createTupleFromQueryAll​(String codeDirectory, String packageSpec, String tupleClassName, String query) throws SQLException
      Use a SELECT query to generate a corresponding Tuple-derived class to represent future evaluations of the same query or similar queries.
      Parameters:
      codeDirectory - Directory in which compiled Tuple-derived source and .class will be generated.
      packageSpec - The package, in dotted notation, to which the Tuple belongs.
      tupleClassName - Name of desired Tuple-derived class.
      query - Query to be evaluated.
      Returns:
      Result of code generation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error.

    • getKeyColumnNamesFor

      public String[] getKeyColumnNamesFor​(String tableName) throws SQLException
      Get primary key for a given table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Table name.
      Returns:
      Array of column names comprising the primary key.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error.

    • processPreparedStatement

      public <T> Response<T> processPreparedStatement​(Database.PreparedStatementUser<T> preparedStatementUser, String query, Object... parms) throws SQLException
      Use a prepared statement.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of return value from use of connection.
      Parameters:
      preparedStatementUser - Instance of PreparedStatementUser, usually as a lambda expression.
      query - SQL text.
      parms - Parameter arguments to prepared statement.
      Returns:
      A PreparedStatementUseResult<T> containing either a T (indicating success) or a SQLException.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error

    • usePreparedStatement

      public <T> T usePreparedStatement​(Database.PreparedStatementUser<T> preparedStatementUser, String query, Object... parms) throws SQLException
      Use a prepared statement.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of return value from user of connection.
      Parameters:
      preparedStatementUser - Instance of PreparedStatementUser, usually as a lambda expression.
      query - SQL text.
      parms - Parameter arguments to prepared statement.
      Returns:
      A value of type T as a result of using a PreparedStatement.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error
